title: and Jackie Cruz
description:
“Orange Is The New Black” star Jackie Cruz got married during COVID19 lockdown! She spills the tea on the intimate ceremony that took place in a very special location in Mexico! She dishes on her hubby’s incredibly romantic gesture, their original vows, and celebrating with a handful of close friends and family. Jackie also talks about her acting start, waiting tables at Sur, pursuing music in her 20s, her Dominican roots, and finding her way back to acting. Plus, Lala & Randall have a baby update!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
